author: wsj.com
title: Sanders Sharpens His Campaign's Tone Against Hillary
text: Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders sharpened the tone of his campaignâ€™s tone against Hillary Clinton in the Iowa Democratic primary. He criticized her for belatedly changing her stance on certain issues, at a moment when the former secretary of state is gaining momentum in the race for the Democratic presidential nomination.
